title: Enforce a meta limiter for rank.
body:
The idea behind this to stop people from choosing champions that don't fulfill a role "correctly." 
If said champ goes to fulfill role incorrectly, punish players with;

Lower Base Stats
Increased Cool Down Reductions
Lesser gold starting

Literally anything that can punish you for going something you shouldn't.
NOTE: This limit breaker will be taken off at Rank Diamond and above. 

Example for Top Lane: Draven top? Less base starting stats
Jungle:  Ahri JG? Mana cost, CD. 
Mid: Quinn mid? Less base stats
ADC: Darius Yassuo adc?
Support: Oh you chose Ryze for Support? More CD to abilities, more mana cost, less starting gold.

You get the point.

replies.body: This has to be some of the dumbest shit i've ever read.
